title: Augmented Reality-Based Bravais Lattice Collaborative Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental decision structure concepts and spatial cognition in 3D environments
context.additional_context: Establishing a real-time collaborative learning environment using AR devices, measuring learning outcomes through project-based assessment

learning_goals: In an AR environment, learners can accurately identify and explain the three-dimensional structures of the 14 Bravais lattices.
Through collaborative learning activities, learners can analyze the relationship between physical properties of crystal structures and materials science applications.
Learners can manipulate virtual crystal models using AR simulation tools and enhance spatial reasoning skills.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
